events: Marcus and Victoria end romantic relationship after professional disagreement
Diana begins planning to frame Marcus for theft to remove him from gallery
Victoria starts questioning authenticity of Diana's Monet acquisition
Diana plants evidence to frame Marcus for minor theft
Marcus is fired from gallery in public humiliation
Victoria discovers anomalies in gallery's authentication records
Victoria contacts Dr. Wells about Monet authentication concerns
Dr. Wells confirms painting is sophisticated modern forgery
Victoria decides to expose Diana's forgery operation publicly
Victoria confronts Diana about forged Monet over phone
Diana realizes Victoria will destroy her reputation and criminal operation
Diana begins planning Victoria's murder and Marcus frame-up
Diana sends anonymous blackmail to Marcus threatening exposure of fabricated theft
Marcus and Victoria have public argument - Diana ensures witnesses see it
Diana arranges charity gala alibi and recruits accomplice for sign-out falsification

events.event: Diana arrives at charity gala, establishes presence with photos
Marcus arrives at gallery per blackmail instructions to plant device
Diana quietly leaves charity gala, accomplice will later falsify sign-out time
Diana arrives at gallery using board access, avoids main cameras
Marcus gets scared and leaves gallery early, abandoning device planting
Victoria arrives for final auction preparations
Diana confronts Victoria in storage room about forgery exposure threat
Diana strangles Victoria with silk rope during heated argument
Diana uses board access to alter security footage timestamps
Diana plants master key duplicate and prepares evidence planting setup
Marcus returns to gallery to retrieve abandoned device, discovers body
Marcus attempts CPR, gets blood on clothes, panics about being found at scene
Diana 'arrives' at gallery and 'discovers' Marcus with body, plants additional evidence
Sarah Chen officially discovers the body and calls police
Diana's accomplice falsifies charity gala sign-out record to show 11:00 PM departure

timeline_consistency_check.marcus_timeline: Arrived 8:00 PM, left 8:25 PM (before murder), returned 9:00 PM (after murder)
timeline_consistency_check.diana_timeline: Left gala 8:15 PM, committed murder 8:47 PM, manipulated evidence 8:50-9:10 PM
timeline_consistency_check.victoria_timeline: Arrived 8:35 PM for auction prep, murdered 8:47 PM in storage room
timeline_consistency_check.physical_evidence_timeline: Blood planted during 9:05-9:10 PM window, key planted 8:55 PM
timeline_consistency_check.digital_evidence_timeline: Security footage altered 8:50 PM using board access privileges
